title: BIG FACTS feat. Waka Flockas Mom MS. DEB
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. Waka Flockas Mom MS. DEB
description:
Waka Flockas mom Ms. Deb discusses her former business relationships with Gucci Mane, Nikki Minaj, OJ, French Montana and more on a new edition of BIG FACTS. Ms. Deb also talks about the streets, the industry and the new "Hip Hop Uncovered" documentary.
